views.markdown:
- Bug fixes - Added support back for armv7 and armv7s devices - Hot fix for IOS 11+
- Removed support for armv7 and armv7s devices
- Added thumbnail support.
- Improved safari video detection.

Next major version should have a video converter
- Fixes critical bug on version 2.8.1

- Fixed video sharing option Added very basic/incomplete Arabic support.
Added the ability to double tap away popups.
Fixed alarm bug.
Bug fixes
- Bug Fixes
- IOS 10 Support.
- Fixed issue with Chrome and Firefox.

This will be my last update until the jailbreak for IOS 10.1.1 gets released. My only device is on 10.1.1 so i can't test anything.
* 2.3.1 *
- Critical bug fixes.


* 2.3 *
- Added/Fixed ability to resume videos.
- Bug Fixes.
- Bug fixes


- Fixed issue in previous update where download notifications wouldn't popup*.

* If you're not getting pop ups go to settings in the UVD - Plus app and in the settings tab enable Old Download Method.
- Tumblr support.
- Changed the way dialogs appear.

Now up to 4 boxes will appear and you have to click those to get the popup dialog.

- Bug fixes.
Fixed issues with Tumblr, Tweetbot and Facebook.
Bug fixes.
- Safari crash fixes( hopefully the final time i need to do this)
- Bug fixes.
*Fixed critical bug were the app didn't work with the previous update.

*Fixed Safari crashes on some/most devices.
*Added auto rotation.
*Bug fixes.

*Fixed Amazon issue.
*Fixed Twitter black screen.
*Fixed Safari crashes.
*Fixed Swiftkey crashes.
*Fixed App Trailers crash.
*Added Video sharing.
*Bug fixes.

After this update you may have to pause and play the video for the dialog to popup.
